A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning\, some great action\, and... well... that's about it really. The story is muddled and takes too long at parts. Too many things can be pointed out that don't really make sense or could be considered disappointing. Some people are saying episode 9 will make this one make more sense but that doesn't really make this movie good if you need it's sequal to enjoy it.
